title: BRAS 4 A CAUSE
description: On Friday (April 27th), students protested after administrators removed two female students from a dance citing clothing as the reason. What’s your take?

questions.text: Did you participate in BRAS 4 A CAUSE this past Friday?
Do you believe that BRAS 4 A CAUSE effectively addressed a significant issue at PA?

options.text: I don’t believe there is an issue

questions.text: Do you believe PA should have explicit dress guidelines?
